$interpreted: Zola: The traitor has been dealt with. Take this child back immediately.
Dracontines: I don't see the corpse...
Zola: You don't want the Second One to find out that the mission was barely accomplished, do you?
Dracontines: No...
Shirley: Give me back my child!
Zola: Sister Shirley...I didn't think you'd have any power left...
Shirley: I surprised even myself...I thought I was done for...
Shirley: Perhaps a mother's love is as strong as they say.
Zola: Is this child really that important to you?
Zola: If you really care so much about this child...
Shirley: Zola! What are you doing!?

Zola: Sister Shirley!! Why him?
...Why...not me?
Zola: Don't you come any closer!
Zola: To be honest...whether this child lives or dies doesn't matter to me.
Zola: Sister Shirley, let's make a bet.
Shirley: Zola, if I die, then you'll...
Shirley: ...take my child to Rune Academy for me, won't you?
Zola: No! Never! I hate this child. He took you away from me!!
Shirley: I trust you'll fulfill my dying wish.
Zola: ... Are you saying that you'd rather die than go back with me...?
Shirley: If I can trade my life for the child's future...it's worth it.
Zola: Stop!
Zola: You win, Sister Shirley...
Zola: I love and care about you more than anyone else in this world, and you used that against me.
Shirley: Zola, I'm sorry.
Zola: There's nothing to be sorry for. You have a child you want to protect...all I have is you.
Shirley: Zola, in all honesty, I...
Dracontines: What's with all these corpses!? Get inside there and search every corner!
Zola: Sister Shirley, you've got to hide!
Dracontines: What's going on!?
Zola: That's my question! Why on earth did the reinforcements take so long!?
Zola: The traitor Shirley has escaped! You, go after her, now!
Dracontines: Yes, ma'am!
Zola: Sister Shirley, you'd best get out of here now.
Shirley: Zola...thank you...
Zola: It'll be difficult to cover your tracks once the sun rises. Get out of here before I change my mind.
Shirley: I'm sorry. I can't stay by your side anymore.
Zola: Yes...We probably won't see each other again.
Shirley: We will, Zola. We will.
Shirley: When everything's over... I'll come and take you out of there.
Zola: ...If you're lying to me, I will never forgive you.
Shirley: You're safe now...Mommy will  come back for you. So before then...
Shirley: Sleep tight, my child...

Zola...thank you...
